channel.title: HI, I'm Josh from zistle.com
channel.description:
Hi all,
I'm happy to have just found about about this place via Reddit.
I have been working with my wife on [zistle.com][1] for the past few years. It started out as a small tool to organize my old baseball cards but then grew pretty quickly into a crowdsourced collectibles database. We have only recently decided to try and turn this into our full-time gig and as such are releasing an e-commerce piece.
Looking forward to the conversations on this board.
Wish us luck!
[1]: http://www.zistle.com
